content:
So what's up for next week's wg-diagnostics check in?

  • @Esteban KÃ¼ber and @oli (soon) have much more time for diagnostics
  • cross-await-borrow-failure explanation: #80614
  • move in method call in loop explanation: #80324
  • [internal] document diagnostics infrastructure: #80046
  • take negative impls into account for "trait item not found" errors: #79790
  • improve attribute spans for diagnostics on attributes: #79509

I found these while skimming through the PR pipeline and checking things tagged with A-diagnostics

Not sure if you want to talk about the librification of the diagnostic emitter: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/59346
The last comment is still the current state; It's depending on one of the open PRs in annotate-snippets-rs. Maybe there are also libraries that are further along than annotate-snippet-rs these days.
